amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce a SEC rule pursuant to section 1502 of the Dodd-Frank Act relating to conflict minerals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 207 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce a SEC rule pursuant to Section 1502 of the Dodd-Frank Act relating to conflict minerals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A169) Agreed to by recorded vote: 211 - 195 (Roll no. 525).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A169) offered by Mr. Huizenga.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
